Author: lilsofish
Text: omg, that's fucking horrible. yes, you may have brought it up but that was not an appropriate response AT ALL.  i'm sure you'll get back to that weight or whatever weight you'd like and i hope you stay safe and healthy as you pursue that goal. also, fuck that whole "you looked really hot like that" comment, you're still the same fucking person and i bet you're still hot.   hopefully, your friend recognizes his mistakes and is better moving forth but if he doesn't get his shit together, you can always message me with ED memes to laugh at! \*stumbles in with suitcase\* the fatrayer can move aside, i'll be your friend and i wish you the best <3
